title: Hour 1 - Andrew Thomas (04-01-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Andrew Thomas (04-01-20)
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Chris Broussard fill in for Dan Patrick and react to the NFL voting to expand the playoffs! The guys discuss whether or not the Dolphins can pull off a trade for the number 1 pick so they can draft Joe Burrow plus Georgia Bulldogs Offensive Tackle Andrew Thomas joins the show to talk about his preparation for the NFL Draft.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
